name: Lion S Kamaraj
description: Vice Chairman, Chennai Devangar Mahajana Sabai
longDescription: A multifaceted businessman with current interests in real estate, building construction, and tour and travel operations. Earlier, he was involved in the textile business and also managed a hotel. He serves the community in his capacity as Vice Chairman of the Chennai Devangar Mahajana Sabai.

name: Mr. A. Abil Muradu Khan
longDescription: He is an NRI and a successful businessman with a strong background in agriculture and a keen interest in organic farming. He is also a social activist and is engaged in financial investment consultancy.

name: Lion Er. P Jeyakodi B.E., M.Tech, MBA
description: Managing Partner, Enrec Engineers & Jee Flyash Products, Chennai
longDescription: He is a multifaceted businessman in the construction field. He has been the Managing Partner of M/s Enrec Engineers, Chennai since 1997 and is also a Managing Partner at M/s Jee Flyash Products, a bricks manufacturing unit in Chennai.

name: Mr. A Mohan B.Com., DBM.
description: Founder Chairman, Vidyasagar Group of Educational Institutions
longDescription: An educationalist by profession, he is the Founder Chairman of the Vidyasagar Group of Educational Institutions, which includes Global School and multiple women’s colleges in Chengalpattu near Chennai.

name: Lion. Smt. Dr. Umaiyal Murugesan M.B.B.S., M.D. (O&G)..,
longDescription: is an Obstetrician and Gynecologist by profession and a committed social activSheist. She is actively involved in educating underprivileged children and is known for her enterprising nature. She serves as the Director of Sree Kumaran Hospital, a multi-specialty hospital located at No. 3A & 3B, Kakkan Street, Tambaram, Chennai–44.
